SEARCH
Package src.view

Class AdministratorView

Object
MainView
AdministratorView
public class AdministratorView extends MainView
This class represents the administrator view, extending the main view. It provides methods for administrators to manage staff, appointments, medication inventory, and other related operations.
Since:
2024-11-20
Version:
1.0
Author:
Seann

      Initializes dummy staff data in the database.
      Returns:

    • selectGender

      private boolean selectGender()
      Prompts the user to select a gender and returns the selection.
      Returns:
      true if a valid gender is selected, false if the selection is invalid.

    • selectRole

      private boolean selectRole()
      Prompts the user to select a role and returns the selection.
      Returns:
      true if a valid role is selected, false if the selection is invalid.

    • approveReplenishmentRequest

      public void approveReplenishmentRequest()
      Approves or rejects replenishment requests. Loops through the pending replenish requests and processes user input for approval or rejection.

    • viewAndManageMedicationInventory

      public void viewAndManageMedicationInventory()
      Allows viewing and managing the medication inventory. Includes options to view inventory, update stock, or set low stock limits.

    • viewAppointmentDetails

      public void viewAppointmentDetails(String hospitalID)
      Views appointment details based on the provided hospital ID. Allows the user to view upcoming or all appointments.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - the ID of the hospital to view appointments for
